Name: Colorado Cocoa Club
About the game: Mikaela Cohen, a workaholic junior architect based in Boston, is in for a surprisingly long vacation. While accompanying her boss on a business trip in Aspen, an unexpected blizzard traps the two architects at the ski resort where they are staying. What will happen to Mikaela while she awaits the end of the blizzard? Who will she meet in this snowy Colorado town? Will she learn to balance her life and maybe make time for love? Only you can find out by playing “Colorado Cocoa Club”. - A charming and hilarious storyline in an alpine setting. - Beautiful Anime influenced character art - Classy Modern Jazz Soundtrack - Multiple endings based on your choices
